article.title: Niitek Awarded $579 Million for Husky Detection Systems
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Niitek Incorporated, Dulles, Virginia, was awarded a $579 million firm-fixed-price, indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract for the procurement of the Husky mounted detection systems and spare parts. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Fort Belvoir, Virginia, is the contracting activity.
